channel.title: Program Ideas?
channel.description:
Well, being bored and in school, you get even more bored. I am requesting your ideas on programs that could be useful.
Don't give me shit RSPS related, I don't want to do that. Boring.
Anything works, just looking for ideas on something to attempt to create. If I create what you suggest, I will post a download link for the source.
Your flamer, -AMERIKA

item.title: Program Ideas?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“Budda, post:3, topic:295055”][quote author=Lin link=topic=390159.msg2912921#msg2912921 date=1250210527]
Make cache-related programs. They can be easy to make at times, and a good outcome in the end.
[/quote]

[quote author=AMERIKA link=topic=390159.msg2912889#msg2912889 date=1250209118]
Don’t give me shit RSPS related, I don’t want to do that. Boring.
[/quote][/quote]It’s not related to a server. By server, I looked at it as being an actual server he didn’t want to work with. However, I later found out he meant anything to do with RuneScape.

In that case, do something random and work with graphics. I’m making a calendar that’s turning out great, and I could release as it is right now. It’s a time killer, and sometimes a challenge for the maths

Read full topic
